io.fluo.api.config

Class ScannerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.fluo.api.config.ScannerConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class ScannerConfiguration
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Contains configuration for a Snapshot scanner. Passed to SnapshotBase.get(ScannerConfiguration).
